name: Project: Mech Combat Bird
description:
This project consists in a platformer level where I have been able to develop different ideas that I would like to apply in a bigger project in the future.

The main objective of this game is to reach the end of the level. There are secondary goals such as defeating every enemy or gathering all of the secret eggs. Find below here some information about the game:

Keep your energy tank protected:

Every time you receive a hit, you will lose one armor feather. These feathers protect your energy tank. If you loose all of them, you will suffer an energy leakage.

Find new feathers though your journey to keep your tank protected.

Fill your energy :

When you defeat an enemy, you can collect some energy from him and recover a bit.

Finding secret eggs will also fill your tank.

Enemies:

Enemies will attack you by throwing rocks. Try returning these rocks in order to counter attack.

Credits

This game is entirely designed and developed by me, except from music and sound effects which I got from https://pixabay.com/es/.
